jump_scares.spoiler: A flashback of Josh hiding under the bed abruptly ends as we hear several loud bangs and a scream
As Carly and Riley sneak through the car park they are startled by a group of parents running past
Kendall violently pushes a knife through the wall, narrowly missing Carly
A flashback of Kendall talking to a younger Carly is abruptly ended as present-day Kendall bursts through a door
After Josh asks “Where’s Mom?”, Kendall’s hand breaks through the closet door
